LLaMa2 GPTQ   Question Answering AI who can provide answers with source documents based on   Texonom .     Made with   Langchain  Chat UI support made by Streamlit Web Component  Rye based python package management       
    
      What's included      Langchain    Langchain  made it easy to Prompt engineering of referencing source documents.
